dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Welcome, Lieutenant, to the bridge of the spaceship Aurora.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Maya
dialogues.text: Thank you, Captain. I've received your briefing on our mission to explore the Xylophia-IV planet.

dialogues.speaker: Narration
dialogues.text: The view screen flickers to life, displaying a swirling vortex of purple and green gases that make up the atmosphere of Xylophia-IV.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: Affirmative, Lieutenant. Our scans indicate unusual energy readings emanating from the planet's core.
